employment_agreement.name: Employment Agreement
employment_agreement.description: Standard employment contract template for SMEs

sections.heading: Position and Duties
sections.standard_text: The Employee shall be employed as [Job Title] and shall perform such duties as are customarily associated with such position, subject to the direction of the Employer.

sections.heading: Compensation
sections.standard_text: The Employee shall receive a monthly salary of Rs. [Amount], payable on or before the 7th of each month, subject to applicable tax deductions.

sections.heading: Working Hours
sections.standard_text: Normal working hours shall be 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday through Friday, with a one-hour lunch break. Total weekly hours shall not exceed 48 hours.

sections.heading: Leave Entitlement
sections.standard_text: The Employee shall be entitled to: (a) 21 days annual leave, (b) 10 days sick leave, (c) 10 public holidays as per company policy.

sections.heading: Notice Period
sections.standard_text: Either party may terminate this agreement by providing 30 days written notice. During probation, the notice period shall be 7 days.

sections.heading: Confidentiality
sections.standard_text: The Employee agrees to maintain confidentiality of all proprietary information during and after employment. This obligation survives termination for a period of 2 years.

sections.heading: Supply of Goods
sections.standard_text: The Vendor agrees to supply goods as per the specifications in Schedule A, within the agreed timelines and quality standards.

sections.heading: Pricing and Payment
sections.standard_text: Prices shall be as specified in Schedule B. Payment shall be made within 30 days of receipt of invoice and delivery of conforming goods.

sections.heading: Delivery
sections.standard_text: Delivery shall be made to [Location] during business hours. Risk of loss passes to Buyer upon delivery and acceptance.

sections.heading: Quality and Inspection
sections.standard_text: Buyer may inspect goods within 7 days of delivery. Non-conforming goods may be rejected with written notice.

sections.heading: Warranty
sections.standard_text: Vendor warrants that goods shall be free from defects for a period of 12 months from delivery. Vendor shall repair or replace defective goods at no cost.

sections.heading: Limitation of Liability
sections.standard_text: Neither party's liability shall exceed the total value of goods supplied in the 12 months preceding any claim.

sections.heading: Scope of Services
sections.standard_text: The Service Provider shall perform services as described in Schedule A (Statement of Work) in a professional and workmanlike manner.

sections.heading: Fees and Payment
sections.standard_text: Client shall pay fees as specified in Schedule B. Invoices shall be issued monthly and payable within 30 days.

sections.heading: Term and Termination
sections.standard_text: This Agreement shall commence on [Date] and continue for [Duration]. Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice.

sections.heading: Intellectual Property
sections.standard_text: Deliverables created specifically for Client shall be owned by Client upon full payment. Service Provider retains rights to pre-existing IP and tools.

sections.heading: Confidentiality
sections.standard_text: Both parties agree to maintain confidentiality of information exchanged during the engagement. This obligation survives for 3 years after termination.

sections.heading: Limitation of Liability
sections.standard_text: Service Provider's total liability shall not exceed fees paid in the 12 months preceding any claim. Neither party shall be liable for indirect or consequential damages.
